snippet.title: Calmed by the Dark Purgatorium - Now on Mobile
snippet.description:
https://calmed-by-the-dark-games.itch...

The first mobile title from Calmed by the Dark Games:
Calmed by the Dark Purgatorium, available now on #itchio 

A tower full of monsters, that reshapes itself every time that you die.

Your objective? Head to the top-floor. Defeat the Gods of Infinity to acquire more power and progress further through the tower.

Calmed by the Dark Purgatorium is a dark action roguelite dungeon crawler.

Minimun System Requirements:

CPU: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 or better
RAM: 4 GB
OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
VIDEO CARD: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
FREE DISK SPACE: 800 Mb
DISPLAY: 1280x768 or better
Calmed by the Dark Purgatorium

Game developed in #RPGMaker MV.

#MobileGame #freetoplay #roguelite #dungeoncrawler #indiedev #indiegame
